definition: Lanping Bai and Pumi autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
a plain/ping, unit of area equal to approx. 3.3058 square meters (used in Japan and Taiwan)

containing_words.word: 蘭坪白族普米族自治縣

sentences.english: Alkaline leaching of Zn from zinc oxide ore from Lanping, Yunnan is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了雲南蘭坪氧化鋅礦石的鹼法浸出。

sentences.english: Test of reducing slime of oxidized zinc ore by using stirring mill has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 採用攪拌磨對蘭坪氧化鋅礦石進行了磨礦試驗。
